name: Ship.io
description: Ship.io is a powerful SaaS service teams use to power Continuous Delivery of native iOS and Android mobile apps. Purpose-built to support and streamline todayu2019s mobile development workflows, Ship.io automates your build-test-deploy cycles so you can ship quality Apps faster.

apis.name: cisimple
apis.description: Building mobile apps is fun and exciting, but setting up a build process is about as painful and unexciting as it gets. Were changing that, and were making Continuous Delivery a reality for mobile developers along the way.
